pkgmetadata.longdescription: Explore Monophyly of Taxonomic Groups in a Phylogeny // Requires rooted phylogeny as input and creates a table of genera, their monophyly-status, which taxa cause problems in monophyly etc. Different information can be extracted from the output and a plot function allows visualization of the results in a number of ways. "MonoPhy: a simple R package to find and visualize monophyly issues." Schwery, O. O'Meara, B.C. (2016) doi:10.7717/peerj-cs.56.
